## types.Zip type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Zip<T, U> = T extends [infer F1, ...infer R1] ? U extends [infer F2, ...infer R2] ? [[F1, F2], ...Zip<R1, R2>] : [] : [];
```
